title: Mvy = mkdirp and mv // a cli for moving to a new directory
author: busterc
content: readme.md mvy mvy = mkdirp + mv // cli moving a directoryinstallation$ npm install mvy --globalusage# major key alert:## 1. the <target> has trailing slash, # <source> be placed inside <target>## 2. both <source> <target> trailing slashes, # *entire* <source> path be appended the <target> path# the <source> files be placed inside appended <target> path# move file a directory$ mvy somewhere/exists/.file yet//be/created/directory/# => yet//be/created/directory/.file# move file a directory rename file$ mvy somewhere/exists/.file yet//be/created/directory/b.file# => yet//be/created/directory/b.file# move directory a directory$ mvy somewhere/exists yet//be/created/directory/# => yet//be/created/directory/exists/# => yet//be/created/directory/exists/.file# move directory a directory rename directory$ mvy somewhere/exists yet//be/created/directory# => yet//be/created/directory/# => yet//be/created/directory/.file# move directory a directory *appending source path*$ mvy somewhere/exists/ yet//be/created/directory/# => yet//be/created/directory/somewhere/exists/# => yet//be/created/directory/somewhere/exists/.filelicenseisc Â© buster collings
